description:
Lizard wants to learn a party trick to impress clients. Toucan is sent to reserve the company`s flower-viewing spot. Lion and Lizard mourn a coworker.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Africa Variety Show / Africa Party Tricks / Africa Flower-Viewing Parties / Africa Party Night! / Africa Flower-Viewing Parties 2 / Africa High-School Girls: What High-School Girls Really Think
